content: self-moderated to keep this thread clean from trolls, attention-seekers and signature spammersThe UEFA Euro 2024 tournament will take place in Germany between 14th June 2024 and 14th July 2024. Germany has already qualified for the tournament by virtue of being the host nation. Italy are the current Euro Champions after they beat England at Wembley Stadium in the delayed Euro 2020 tournament (which took place in 2021) because of the issues related to the COVID pandemic. This thread can be used to discuss anything related to the Euro 2024 tournament but keep in mind that low-quality posts will be deleted alongside posts from attention-seekers, signature spammers and trolls.

comments.body: RESULTS:Saturday 15th June:Hungary 1-3 Switzerland  Spain 3-0 CroatiaFriday 14th June:Germany 5-1 ScotlandGermany kicked-off the tournament in style yesterday with a stunning win over Scotland. If Rudiger did not head in an own-goal Scotland would have lost 5-0 because they were not going to score themselves.Switzerland are said to be playing in their final tournament with their golden generation and they will want to make an impact. Spain had a good start to the tournament too.We are only three games in to the tournament and apart from Germany, no other team looks like they will win it (maybe being the host nation will give them a boost)  There is one more game to be played today: Italy vs Albania edit: Italy 2-1 Albania Italy came back from behind to win the game after Albania scored after just 23 seconds (which is the fastest goal ever scored at a Euro tournament).

Nobody, including me, expected Belgium to lose that match. Belgium were horrible today. The midfield was so poor, they couldn't break the defence and Lukaku was something else. They were horrible. comments.body: These are the results from the games played yesterday Monday 17th June:Romania 3-0 Ukraine Belgium 0-1 Slovakia Austria 0-1 France Well done to Romania for a big win over Ukraine but the stand out result was Slovakia beating Belgium. It looks like the Belgium team golden generation will not be successful and will fade away unless they win their next game.The story of the day had to about the injury suffered by Mbappe when France played their game against Austria. He tried to head the ball but collided with the head of an Austrian player. When reporters asked France manager Deschamps about whether Mbappe broke his nose, he said he probably did. Since then it has been reported that Mbappe will still play in their next group game but will wear a protective face mask.In the same game it was good to see a very talented yet humble human being showing glimpses of brilliance when he playing for Leicester City in their Premier League title winning season. Kante had an excellent game.
